description.raw:
segtools-feature-distance records the distance between a segment and an annotation in a variable named counts. The counts variable was erroneously re-initialized for each chromosomes so at the end of the run,  counts contains only the count for the last chromosome.

This fix initializes the counts variable at the beginning of the function, before looping over each chromosomes so all the counts are preserved.
description.html:
segtools-feature-distance records the distance between a segment and an annotation in a variable named counts. The counts variable was erroneously re-initialized for each chromosomes so at the end of the run, counts contains only the count for the last chromosome.

This fix initializes the counts variable at the beginning of the function, before looping over each chromosomes so all the counts are preserved.

title: Fix feature distance behavior
